name: Slow Cooker Vegan Leek and Potato Soup
author: Buckwheat Queen
summary: A hearty soup without animal products but still full of rich flavor. Sauteing before slow cooking brings out the flavor of seemingly simple ingredients.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Turn on the Saute function on your slow cooker
Heat vegan butter and olive oil
Add leeks, onion, carrot, and mushrooms
Cook and stir until leeks and onions are translucent and softened, carrots have softened, and minced mushrooms have liquefied, about 7 minutes
Add potatoes and vegetable broth; mix well
Mix 1 tablespoon of the oat milk with potato starch to create a slurry and stir it into the soup
Heat remaining oat milk in a microwave-safe bowl in the microwave until hot, about 30 seconds
Pour it into the soup and season with salt and pepper
Cook in the slow cooker on Low for 6 hours or on High for 3 1/2 hours
